page.title: 02LEISURE TIME IN NEWHAVEN
page.content:
There are many clubs in the area which satisfy all ages and interests. For the young there are Newhaven cubs, brownies, scouts, guides, girls brigade plus Newhaven Boys club for boys and girls. For the old there is an Age Concern Club which meets every day except Sunday, offering tea and chat.
Political groups meet at the Conservative and Labour Party Clubs. Disabled people can meet at the Bluebird Club or Mencap centre. There are three armed forces groups, one for training sea cadets, one is an air corps and the third is the Royal British Legion for ex-servicemen. Other activities include a choir, an Amateur Dramatic Society, a Lifeboat Society, Deep Sea Anglers association and a branch of Rotary.
